title: Test Developers in Electrification, TRATON Group R&D
description:
Test Developers in Electrification, TRATON Group R&D


**We are looking for several Test Developers!**

TRATON is a group of strong brands with a shared mission: transforming transportation together to create the future of sustainable transport solutions. Within TRATON, we include MAN, Scania, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International. As part of a global team of industry experts, you get to think bigger, experience more, and reach further. Together, we have the power to transform transportation - Let´s make a difference together. Find out more: www.traton.com  



Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do.**Role summary**

This role is a part of TRATON Group R&D, located in Södertälje, Sweden  



Are you ready to be part of TRATON's exciting transformation from a leading truck and bus supplier to an innovative creator of sustainable transport solutions? With us, you have the opportunity to contribute to the development of electrified transport vehicles and become a key player in the electric future. We are now looking for three more test engineers who want to be part of this journey and shape the sustainable transport solutions of the future.**Job responsibilities**

As a test engineer at TRATON, you will develop a broad competence within the vehicle's control system and get an overview of how different functions work together in the software. Here, you not only get the opportunity to use your creativity and innovative ideas, but also to find effective ways to verify and improve our products.  



Your duties will include system testing for software, including requirements review, test case creation, and creation of test scripts for automated tests. Testing will be performed both in test rigs (SIL and HIL) and in real vehicles (trucks and buses). You will also be responsible for analyzing test results and constantly working to improve strategies and methods. Close cooperation with software developers and system owners is a natural part of your role to deliver high-quality products to our customers.**Who you are**

We are looking for candidates both with a few years of experience in a similar role and if you are a recent university/college graduate. You are responsible and structured when it comes to making decisions together with the rest of us. You have an ability to solve complex problems and enjoy challenging yourself and your colleagues to find creative solutions. Flexibility is a key skill, and you are ready to change focus when needed.  



To be qualified for this job, you should have:
* A degree as a university engineer or civil engineer in electrical engineering, embedded systems, or mechatronics.
* Knowledge of programming, preferably Python.
* A merit to have a European driving license for a car.
* Master English, both spoken and written.
* Merit to master Swedish, both spoken and written.
**This is us**

In our team, we work closely together in an inclusive and creative environment. We help each other every day and have close cooperation to each other. Sometimes we work from home and sometimes from the office - it's flexible. The team is mixed in both gender, age, and nationality, and this means that we are innovative together in a lovely and friendly environment.**TRATON offers**

At TRATON Software Factory, we believe in your success and development. As part of our team, you will have access to fantastic local and international development opportunities, work with professional colleagues, and be part of a revolutionary journey in the transport industry.  



Benefits include wellness allowance, bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. We also host events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job Express buses for an easy commute to Södertälje.**Application**

Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.  



Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-11-17. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.  



If you have questions or would like more information, please contact: David Alstig, Head of System Test Battery & Electrification, david.alstig@scania.com.  



We look forward to your application!  



This recruitment process is handled by Scania for TRATON Group R&D. #LI-OW1 #LI-Hybrid
**Requisition ID:** 20404
**Number of Openings:** 4.0
**Part-time / Full-time:** Full-time
**Permanent / Temporary:** Permanent
**Country/Region:** SE
**Location(s):**Södertälje, SE, 151 38
**Required Travel:** 0-25%
**Workplace:** Hybrid

title: Senior iOS-utvecklare (Swift)
description:
Vi söker en **erfaren iOS-utvecklare** med djup kompetens inom **Swift** som vill vara med och driva utvecklingen av innovativa och tekniskt avancerade lösningar. Du blir en central del av teamet och arbetar nära andra utvecklare, testare och designers i en miljö där kvalitet och prestanda står i fokus.

### **Arbetsuppgifter**

* Designa, utveckla och optimera iOS-applikationer i Swift

* Arbeta med komplexa system, exempelvis karttjänster eller motsvarande lösningar

* Delta i testning och kvalitetssäkring av kod

* Samarbeta tvärfunktionellt för att säkerställa robusta och användarvänliga lösningar


### **Vi söker dig som har**

* **Minst 5 års erfarenhet av Swift** och iOS-utveckling

* Stark förståelse för **Computer Science-grunder** såsom minneshantering, algoritmer och låg-nivåprinciper

* Erfarenhet av **testning och utveckling av karttjänster** eller liknande applikationer


### **Meriterande**

* Erfarenhet av **automatisering av tester**

* Kunskaper inom **backend (Java, Scala)**

* Erfarenhet av **Machine Learning**


### **Personliga egenskaper**


Du är **nyfiken, analytisk och lösningsorienterad** med en naturlig förmåga att samarbeta. Du trivs i ett högt tempo, tar ansvar för helheten och levererar med kvalitet även under press.

### **Språk**

* Engelska – krav

* Svenska – meriterande


Låter det som något för dig Skicka in din ansökan redan idag!

title: Backend Developer
description:
**About Star Stable Entertainment**


Once upon a time in 2011, the founders of Star Stable Entertainment had a vision. They wanted to create a game that could make a difference. Although half of gamers are girls and women, they were under-represented in the gaming industry, both as characters and creators. We dreamed of an epic online world where tween and teen girls could share an amazing experience. And we wanted to challenge how things were done in a male-dominated industry. Fast forward to today, and our dream has come true tenfold - Star Stable Online stands as one of the most popular MMORPGs globally! At our HQ on Södermalm, our 140 employees are thrilled to continue to welcome players to the island of Jorvik, with its breathtaking scenery, beautiful horses, and magical quests. It’s wonderful to see that our dream resonates with so many players around the world, and we can’t wait to share more stories and experiences with them!


Now we are looking for our Backend Developer who will be a major contributor for making improvements, finding creative ways to solve problems, and implementing new solutions. Would you like to grow professionally in a friendly environment with work-life balance that is open to new ideas? Then read on!

**The position and responsibilities:**


You will join a team with the mission of creating a scalable architecture to future-proof our game Star Stable Online. You will focus on the game backend, effectively building server-side game logic using microservices. In this role you will help your teammates decide on architecture and what direction to move.


Right now, the team is working with Go, Python with MySQL, Redis and Postgres databases all run in AWS which is maintained with terraform. You will have a lot of freedom in deciding what should be used though if something else is better suited for the task at hand. If you like to take initiative, drive ideas in collaboration with other team members, then this is a position for you!

 **What we are looking for and what we are using:**

  

* Knowledge of Object Oriented Programming languages (Go and Python)
* Experience working with microservices
* Test driven mindset (Integration testing, Unit testing)
* Experience with event-driven architecture
* Experience working with databases (Postgres and MySQL)
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, SQS, SNS, Firehose, S3, ECS, EC2, Fargate etc..)
* CI/CD experience (Github Actions)
* Several years of relevant professional experience (around 4-6 years)
* Experience working in teams using agile methodology
* Strong communicator with a professional and approachable style

 **Perks for joining us?**

* A pretty sweet mission. We are developing the world's best horse-riding game for girls and we take that vision very seriously. We strive to hit that mark every single day.
* 30 vacation days (+ 3 additional squeeze days).
* A pension and insurance plan that mimics ITP1 and a parental pay top-up @90%.
* Health allowance at 5000 SEK per year.
* Hybrid working model - combine WFH and being together with the team at our new office located right amidst Södermalm GameDev cluster (Magnus Ladulåsgatan 65)
* Fitness discount of 18% at SATS gym + company workout classes.
* A dog room at the office! Bring your furry friend to work!


Are you ready to be a chapter on this magical journey? Apply now! We can’t wait to hear your story!

Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

title: Frontend Developer to Web Manuals
description:
At Web Manuals, we’re redefining aviation with our state-of-the-art SaaS solutions. Our mission? To revolutionize how aviation professionals work while reaching new heights of innovation and service. As a bootstrapped company, we chart our own course, breaking barriers and setting our sights on the stars and beyond. We’re proud to offer an environment where you can soar—both professionally and personally—and explore a world of opportunities within an international team.


With offices in Malmö (HQ), San Diego, New York, and Singapore, we’re growing rapidly. Now, we’re on the hunt for a **Frontend Developer** to join our team in **Malmö**! *Take the leap and join Web Manuals on our journey to revolutionize aviation—apply today!*

### **About the role**


As a Frontend Developer at Web Manuals, you’ll be part of our dedicated Engineering Team, working closely with and reporting to our Director of Engineering. The team includes experienced Senior Developers, Fullstack Developers, a Software Testing team, and a System Administrator. Together, we collaborate daily in a supportive, fast-paced environment, following the kanban-model for agile development.

### **Your key responsibilities**

* Develop, maintain, and enhance Web Manuals’ web-based services and applications.
* Collaborate closely with fellow developers, testers, and system administrators to deliver high-quality, user-focused solutions.
* Participate in agile development workflows using the Kanban model, contributing to continuous improvement and efficient delivery.
* Implement clean, scalable, and maintainable front-end code using JavaScript frameworks and best practices.
* Work closely with UX/UI designers to translate design concepts into responsive and accessible user interfaces.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize performance to ensure a seamless user experience across devices and browsers.
* Contribute to code reviews, knowledge sharing, and team discussions to maintain high engineering standards.
* Stay up to date with emerging frontend technologies and propose improvements to tools, processes, and architecture.

### **What we're looking for**

* 2+ years professional experience as a frontend developer.
* Professional experience working with JavaScript and/or Typescript.
* Professional experience working with HTML and CSS.
* Experience from web application development.

**It's also a plus if you have:*** Post-secondary education within a relevant area.
* Experience in LangChain or other AI development
* Experience working with Angular.

Experience from product development.  
* 

### **Other information**

* Start date: ASAP
* Location: Malmö
* Work extent: Full-time
* Flexibility: 25% per month
* As part of our recruitment process, we use the Predictive Index (PI) assessment to ensure a great fit between your skills and our company culture.
* A criminal record check will also be conducted during the final stage, in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

  



Curious about what it’s like to work at Web Manuals? Check out our new Instagram account and visit our About us page!

title: Backend Developer Azure / .Net
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Solid background in Azure and .NET technologies
* Practical knowledge of Azure Functions and Azure Container Apps
* Proven experience in developing, managing, and optimizing RESTful APIs
* Experience working with Cosmos DB and Table Storage
* Familiarity with Entra ID
* Deep understanding of API-first principles with focus on clarity, efficiency, and long-term scalability
* Hands-on experience with Infrastructure as Code practices
* Experience implementing solutions using Service Bus and Event Grid
* Strong ability to communicate complex technical topics in a clear and accessible way
* Understanding of role-based access control (RBAC)

  

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 12-11-2025

  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Unity Developer - Stockholm
description:
**About Justera Group**  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**  

We are seeking a skilled Unity Developer to join a dynamic gaming team. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the re-architecture of an existing game and help scale it for years to come. You will work closely with the Game Architect and Tech Leads to deliver technical improvements that enable new product capabilities and support the game’s long-term strategic vision.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Incrementally build and deliver technical architecture improvements within the game.
* Collaborate closely with the Game Architect and Tech Leads to investigate, design, and implement technical solutions.
* Actively contribute to evolving team processes, planning, and ways of working.
* Support re-architecture initiatives and codebase enhancements to ensure long-term scalability of the game.
* 

**Requirements:**

* Strong experience in Unity (C#) development.
* Solid understanding of software engineering principles, including SOLID design.
* Experience with code refactoring and developing scalable systems.
* Familiarity with Test Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior Driven Development (BDD).
* Proactive, collaborative team player with strong self-leadership and a can-do attitude.
* Comfortable working on exploratory tasks and tackling unknown challenges.
* Degree in Engineering or a related technical field (or equivalent experience, minimum 4 years).
* 

**What We Offer:**

  

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Backend Developer to Web Manuals
description:
At Web Manuals, we’re redefining aviation with our state-of-the-art SaaS solutions. Our mission? To revolutionize how aviation professionals work while reaching new heights of innovation and service. As a bootstrapped company, we chart our own course, breaking barriers and setting our sights on the stars and beyond. We’re proud to offer an environment where you can soar—both professionally and personally—and explore a world of opportunities within an international team.


With offices in Malmö (HQ), San Diego, New York, and Singapore, we’re growing rapidly. Now, we’re on the hunt for a **Backend Developer** to join our team in **Malmö**! *Take the leap and join Web Manuals on our journey to revolutionize aviation—apply today!*

### **About the role**


As a Backend Developer at Web Manuals, you’ll be part of our dedicated Engineering Team, working closely with and reporting to our Director of Engineering. The team includes experienced Senior Developers, Fullstack Developers, a Software Testing team, and a System Administrator. Together, we collaborate daily in a supportive, fast-paced environment, following the kanban-model for agile development.

### **Your key responsibilities**

* Develop, maintain, and enhance Web Manuals’ web-based services and applications.
* Collaborate closely with fellow developers, testers, and system administrators to deliver high-quality solutions.
* Participate in agile development workflows using the Kanban model, contributing to continuous improvement and efficient delivery.
* Implement clean, scalable, secure, and maintainable back-end code using Java, SQL, and best practices.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize performance to ensure a streamlined delivery to all types of clients.
* Contribute to code reviews, knowledge sharing, and team discussions to maintain high engineering standards.
* Stay up to date with emerging backend technologies and propose improvements to tools, processes, and architecture.

### **What we're looking for**

* 4+ years of professional experience as a developer
* Minimum bachelors degree in computer science, or comparable work experience
* Professional experience in web application development
* Professional experience working the Java programming language
* Professional experience working with SQL databases

**It's also a plus if you have:*** Experience in JavaScript/TypeScript for NodeJS
* Experience in LangChain or other AI development
* Prior work experience in a product development company

### **Other information**

* Start date: ASAP
* Location: Malmö
* Work extent: Full-time
* Flexibility: 25% per month
* As part of our recruitment process, we use the Predictive Index (PI) assessment to ensure a great fit between your skills and our company culture.
* A criminal record check will also be conducted during the final stage, in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

  



Curious about what it’s like to work at Web Manuals? Check out our new Instagram account and visit our About us page!

title: System developer C# / .NET
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

 **Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* 8+ years of professional experience in software development

  

* Strong skills in C# and .NET

  

* Solid understanding of software architecture and SOLID principles

  

* Experience with industrial systems and automation.

  

* Experience in computer vision is a plus

  

* Ability to understand complex systems and collaborate directly with customers and stakeholders

  

**Application deadline:** 14-11-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Integrationsutvecklare
description:
**Rollbeskrivning**
-------------------


Du utvecklar, förbättrar och underhåller integrationslösningar i en modern plattformsmiljö. Uppdraget omfattar migrering från BizTalk till OpenShift, förenkling av befintliga integrationer för bättre förvaltning samt proaktivt arbete för att minska incidenter. Rollen kräver fysisk närvaro tre dagar per vecka.

**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------

* Utveckla nya integrationer och anpassa befintliga utifrån verksamhetens behov.
* Driva migrering från BizTalk till OpenShift-baserad miljö.
* Förenkla och standardisera befintliga integrationsflöden.
* Analysera rotorsaker till incidenter och implementera förebyggande åtgärder.
* Uppdatera och förbättra dokumentation och övrigt strukturkapital.
* Samarbeta med testgrupp för att bygga och förvalta en testsvit med automatiserade tester.
* Samverka med angränsande team kring underhåll, vidareutveckling och produktionsöverlämningar.

**Krav**
--------

* Erfarenhet av integrationsutveckling i komplexa miljöer.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av BizTalk och av migrering eller nyutveckling på container-/OpenShift-plattform.
* God förmåga att analysera och åtgärda återkommande incidenter.
* Erfarenhet av testautomation på integrationsnivå.
* Vana att dokumentera lösningar på ett strukturerat sätt.
* Möjlighet att arbeta på plats tre dagar per vecka.

**Meriterande**
---------------

* Erfarenhet av CI/CD för integrationsflöden och övervakning/loggning.
* Kunskap om API-first, REST, meddelandebussar och köteknik.
* Erfarenhet av samarbete med förvaltning och drift vid produktionssättning.

**Start/Längd**
---------------


Start: 2025-12-01  

Längd: till 2027-12-01

**Plats**
---------


Göteborg (hybrid, 3 dagar/vecka på plats)

**Om Rasulson Consulting**
--------------------------


Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med både etablerade teknikbolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda attraktiva karriärmöjligheter för dig som vill utvecklas inom digitalisering och IT. Genom vår djupa tekniska kompetens och vårt omfattande nätverk matchar vi rätt konsult med rätt uppdrag – snabbt och träffsäkert. Hos oss får du personlig rådgivning, kontinuerlig återkoppling och möjlighet att ta nästa steg i din karriär.

title: .NET Utvecklare/ Scrum Master
description:
**Rollbeskrivning**
-------------------


Vi söker en senior .NET-utvecklare som kombinerar utveckling med Scrum Master-ansvar, ungefär 50/50. Du leder teamets agila arbetssätt och driver utveckling av molnbaserade lösningar i Azure med fokus på kvalitet, skalbarhet och modern arkitektur.

**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------

* Leda och facilitera sprintplanering, dagliga standups, refinement och retrospektiv.
* Driva kontinuerliga förbättringar av arbetssätt, flöden och samarbete mellan team.
* Designa och utveckla .NET-baserade tjänster och API:er i en mikrotjänstmiljö.
* Vidareutveckla micro frontends i React.
* Implementera integrationsmönster för synkron och asynkron kommunikation i distribuerade system.
* Containerisera och driftsätta applikationer i OpenShift eller liknande plattform.
* Bygga och optimera CI/CD-pipelines samt hantera IaC i Bicep.
* Säkerställa hög kvalitet via TDD, kodgranskning och förbättring av mjukvaruarkitektur.
* Arbeta med moderna designmönster inklusive CQRS och event sourcing samt resilienta integrationsmönster (t.ex. saga, outbox/inbox).
* Dela kunskap och coacha teamet i teknik och agila metoder.

**Krav**
--------

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet som Scrum Master med förmåga att facilitera agila ceremonier.
* Stark samarbets- och kommunikationsförmåga inom och mellan team.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av .NET och mikrotjänstarkitektur.
* God förståelse för integrationsmönster för distribuerade system.
* Van vid containerisering och deployment i OpenShift eller liknande.
* Arbetar enligt testdrivna principer och har tydligt kvalitetsfokus.
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD och Infrastructure as Code, gärna Bicep.
* Förmåga att tillämpa moderna designmönster, CQRS, event sourcing samt resilienta integrationsmönster.

**Meriterande**
---------------

* Erfarenhet från försäkringsdomänen och förståelse för regelefterlevnad.
* Vana att använda GitHub Copilot eller liknande utvecklar-AI i vardagen.
* Intresse för och praktisk nyfikenhet på AI inom systemutveckling.

**Start/Längd**
---------------

* Start: 2025-11-24
* Längd: till 2026-05-29 (möjlighet till förlängning kan diskuteras)

**Plats**
---------

* Stockholm (hybrid, 50 % på plats; måndagar och onsdagar obligatoriska)

### **Om Rasulson Consulting**


Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med både etablerade teknikbolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda attraktiva karriärmöjligheter för dig som vill utvecklas inom digitalisering och IT. Genom vår djupa tekniska kompetens och vårt omfattande nätverk matchar vi rätt konsult med rätt uppdrag – snabbt och träffsäkert. Hos oss får du personlig rådgivning, kontinuerlig återkoppling och möjlighet att ta nästa steg i din karriär.

title: Frontendutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**

  

* Du har några års relevant erfarenhet.
* Du har erfarenhet av Angular-utveckling.
* Du har god kunskap inom WCAG och tillgänglighetsprinciper.
* Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med eller bygga komponentbibliotek/designsystem.
* Du har förmåga att kommunicera och samarbeta med både designers och utvecklingsteam.
* Du har god vana av att agera självständigt och driva tekniska beslut framåt.
* Erfarenhet av Continuous Integration, särskilt Jenkins och npm-publicering, är meriterande.

  

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 10-11-2025 **Om Oss**  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
**Ska-krav:**  

* Minst 8 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete i rollen som Systemutvecklare varav minst 4 år inom hälso- och sjukvård.
* Dokumenterade erfarenheter av utvecklingsarbete för tekniska miljöer och datalager inom regional verksamhet.

  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete i databaserna Microsoft SQL Server och Postgres.

  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med kryptering, krypteringstjänster, API-tjänster och säker datahantering.

  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av orkestreringsverktyget Kubernetes och arbete i detta med


exempelvis konfiguration, drift, och felsökning i produktionsmiljöer.  

  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av hämtning och transformering av data med hjälp av SQLMesh.

  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av programmering i språken Python och SQL.

  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete i operativsystemet Linux (RHEL9).

  

* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift, för att kunna kommunicera med interna och externa parter

 **Meriterande:**  

* Erfarenhet av att ta ut data i utdatasystemen Intelligence, ClockWork, Raindance och CHA.

  

**Var god förklara hur du uppfyller alla kraven.**  

  

**Omfattning:** 100%  

**Ort:** Stockholm  

**Period**: 01-01-2026-31-12-2026  

**Sista ansökningdag: 17-11-2025**  

  

*Vi presenterar löpande. Om du är intresserad av ett uppdrag rekommenderar vi att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.*

title: Senior Javautvecklare Norrköping
description:
*Klockan är 07:30. Kaffet smakar bränt. Du önskar du kände oss. Varmt välkommen till Castra!*

*Vi utmanar de traditionella konsultbolagen och kan med stolthet säga att Castra är konsultbranschens mest utvecklande arbetsplats där allt är möjligt. Känns det här som företaget för dig så läs gärna vidare!*

**Rollen**


I rollen som Senior Javautvecklare får du en central position där du utvecklar och vidareutvecklar avancerade Java-lösningar med hjälp av moderna tekniker och plattformar. Tillsammans med andra specialister i tvärfunktionella team driver du innovation, effektiviserar processer och tar dig an komplexa tekniska utmaningar.  

  

Vi söker dig med denna erfarenhet:

  

* 4+ års arbetserfarenhet av Java
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i Agila metoder.
* En vilja att dela kunskap, lära nytt och bidra till ett positivt teamklimat.
* Vara bosatt i Norrköping.

**Varför ska du välja oss?**


Här tror vi på frihet, möjligheter och medbestämmande. Att du som medarbetare ska ha möjlighet att utvecklas och forma ditt arbete utefter dina intressen och prioriteringar i livet. Att alla får vara med och forma och påverka bolaget genom delägarskap, advisory board och projektgrupper. Att det är viktigt att ha ett sammanhang, känna tillhörighet och att man har kollegor som stöttar, utvecklar och tror på en.

**Det bästa åt de bästa – vår personalfilosofi**

  

Castra är en konsultgrupp inom IT och management. Eller ja, en elite-squad kan man säga. Vi samlar de vassaste och mest erfarna konsulterna, helt enkelt för att det är hos oss de får ut max i både kapacitet och livskvalitet.


Vi är en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser. Det låter lite skrytsamt, förlåt. Men det är faktiskt inte vi som sagt det. Castra har sedan 2017 blivit certifierad av Great Place to Work och har de senaste två åren blivit utnämnda till Sveriges Bästa Arbetsgivare. Som grädde på moset har vi även blivit utnämnda till Europas bästa arbetsgivare av Great Place to Work!


Du som konsult styr själv vilka uppdrag du tar, när du jobbar, om du vill levla upp någon kompetens och hur och mycket lön och semester du tar ut. Stöd av bra chefer, aktiviteter, kompetent och snabbfotad säljstyrka, egen upphandlingsenhet, möjlighet till delägarskap, stora möjligheter att påverka bolagets framtid och härliga kollegor – listan på vad som gör Castra till en fantastisk arbetsplats kan göras lååång. Summan av kardemumman är att hos oss är möjligheterna väldigt nära oändliga. Win win för alla parter, säger vi.


Castra har kontor i Norrköping, Linköping, Örebro, Karlstad, Jönköping, Göteborg, Stockholm, Malmö och Sundsvall. Mer information om Castra-koncernen hittar du på vår hemsida https://www.castra.se/om-oss/


Har vi lyckats väcka ditt intresse, hör av dig!


Christoffer Westrin: christoffer.westrin@castra.se


Moa Serneholt: moa.serneholt@castra.se

title: Frontendutvecklare - Stockholm
description:
**Senior Angularutvecklare – Komponentbibliotek och tillgänglighet**

**Rollbeskrivning**  

Du säkerställer kontinuitet och vidareutveckling av komponentbibliotek och UI-implementationer med fokus på WCAG, kodkvalitet och effektivt samarbete mellan design och utveckling.

**Arbetsuppgifter**

* Fungera som länk mellan designteam och utvecklingsteam, både lokalt och offshore.
* Utveckla, skapa och anpassa Angular-komponenter med fokus på digital tillgänglighet enligt WCAG.
* Coacha utvecklare i goda utvecklingsmönster och korrekt användning av komponentbiblioteket.
* Delta i tekniska beslut kopplade till arkitektur, säkerhet, komponentdesign och ramverk.
* Bidra till refaktorering med fokus på läsbarhet, struktur och prestanda.
* Underhålla och vidareutveckla pipelines för publicering av npm-paket i Jenkins och Node.
* Stödja produktägare i planering och kravanalys av kommande komponenter och funktioner.
* Arbeta med relevant dokumentation inom Node, Angular och Java.

**Krav**

* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift (obligatoriskt).
* Flera års erfarenhet av utveckling i Angular.
* Mycket god kunskap om WCAG och digital tillgänglighet.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med eller bygga komponentbibliotek och designsystem.
* Stark samarbetsförmåga med både designers och utvecklingsteam.
* Vana att agera självständigt och driva tekniska beslut.

**Meriterande**

* Erfarenhet av CI/CD, särskilt Jenkins, samt publicering av npm-paket.
* Erfarenhet av Node.js i bygg- och releaseflöden.
* Erfarenhet av refaktoreringsarbete i större kodbaser.
* Erfarenhet av Java i frontendnära integrationer.
* Vana att strukturera och underhålla teknisk dokumentation.

**Start/Längd**  

Start: Omgående  

Längd: Enligt överenskommelse (möjlighet till förlängning)

**Plats**  

Stockholm

**Om Rasulson Consulting**  

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med både etablerade teknikbolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda attraktiva karriärmöjligheter för dig som vill utvecklas inom digitalisering och IT. Genom vår djupa tekniska kompetens och vårt omfattande nätverk matchar vi rätt konsult med rätt uppdrag – snabbt och träffsäkert. Hos oss får du personlig rådgivning, kontinuerlig återkoppling och möjlighet att ta nästa steg i din karriär.

title: Frontend Developer Revenue Engineering
description:
**About us**

  

Soundtrack is a B2B scale-up company providing music streaming services for businesses. We serve small customers like the café around the corner, and much bigger brands like Joe & the Juice, Toni & Guy and TAG Heuer. On the inside, we're a bunch of talented, motivated and humble designers, engineers and music experts. We believe in product-led growth, where the product is the primary driver of customer acquisition, conversion and expansion.

 **The Role**


We're looking for a frontend engineer to join our Revenue Engineering team.


The team is responsible for subscription & account management, checkout, product packaging & expansion/upsell.

  

As a frontend engineer, you be involved in the whole feature development lifecycle from ideation to implementation, in close collaboration with other engineers, product owners, UX/UI designers and analysts. You will help ensure that our customers, whether small business owners or enterprise clients, have a smooth journey from onboarding to expansion.

 **Responsibilities**

  

* Develop and maintain our web and mobile clients, collaborating closely with designers
* Work on multiple frontend codebases, optimize system performance, reliability, and cost efficiency
* Build and refine APIs to support subscription and account management
* Making sure our systems stay performant, reliable and cost efficient
* Run A/B tests end-to-end with the analytics team to iterate on functionality
* Contribute to a supportive, knowledge-sharing team culture

  

**About You**

  

You're someone who thrives in a collaborative environment, enjoying the process of solving problems as part of a team. With a curious and open mindset, you're always eager to learn, explore new ideas, and embrace challenges.


You know how to prioritise and adapt in a fast-moving setting while keeping sight of the bigger picture. Open communication is important to you, and you feel comfortable both giving and receiving constructive feedback in a supportive and respectful way.


With at least three years of experience as a frontend engineer, you have worked with web frameworks, large codebases, and A/B testing, bringing both technical expertise and a growth-oriented approach to your work.

  

**Requirements**

  

* You feel at home building robust, maintainable web apps
* Strong proficiency in TypeScript and JavaScript
* You’ve worked with React and React Native before
* Comfortable with Git, Node, (p)npm and RN/browser dev tools
* Services are accessed using GraphQL and REST.
* Automated testing (especially front-end), for example with Jest/Vitest and Playwright.
  

**Employee Benefits**

* + We offer a flexible workplace with the possibility to work remotely
	+ Generous pension plan
	+ Yearly budget for health, wellness and personal development
	+ Laptop and mobile phone of your choice with included cellular subscription
	+ Regular social activities such as team events, meet ups, after works and off-sites
	+ Daily breakfast served at the office


At Soundtrack, we believe that diversity fuels creativity and innovation. We're committed to building a team that reflects a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences. We welcome applications from individuals of all races, ethnicities, genders, ages, abilities, religions, sexual orientations, and identities.


We reserve the right to close this vacancy early if we identify a suitable candidate before the application deadline. To ensure consideration, we encourage you to submit your application as soon as possible.


If you have any questions about the position or need to reach out, get in touch with Marcus Revfalk at marcus@soundtrack.io. Please note that we only accept applications submitted via our career page and do not accept applications by e-mail.

title: Backend developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

 **Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* REST APIs; define, build and maintain
* Strong focus on API-first development, with emphasis on clarity, performance, and long-term maintainability
* Good communication skills, describe technical things in an easy and understandable language
* Azure / .NET
* Infrastructure as Code
* Azure Function
* Azure Container Apps
* Cosmos DB / Table Storage
* RBAC
* Entra ID
* Service Bus
* Event Grid

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 14-11-2025  


  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Backend Developer - Stockholm
description:
**About Justera Group**  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**  

This project focuses on developing a digital identity wallet that enables citizens to securely manage digital versions of certificates, proofs, and identification documents such as ID cards, driving licenses, and professional licenses. We are seeking experienced backend developers to join the team in building a secure, scalable, and high-performance digital identity solution. The ideal candidates are passionate about security, thrive in agile environments, and enjoy creating technology with real-world impact.


**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design, develop, and maintain backend services for the digital identity wallet.
* Ensure security, scalability, and reliability throughout development.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an agile environment.
* Contribute to open-source initiatives and maintain high-quality code.
* Build, operate, and monitor container-based systems
* 

**Requirements:**

* Java development experience: Minimum 5 years.
* Linux environment development: Minimum 3 years.
* Microservices architecture: Minimum 3 years.
* Framework experience: Quarkus, Spring Boot, or equivalent (Minimum 3 years).
* Tooling proficiency: Git, Maven, Gradle, or other modern development tools.
* Agile team-based development: Minimum 3 years.
* Languages: Fluent in Swedish and English (spoken and written).

Experience with KPI, certificate management, cryptographic security functions, or HSM (* 1 year).

Basic knowledge of app or front-end development (* 1 year).

Experience with container orchestration and monitoring (Kubernetes, OpenShift, or similar,* 1 year).

Experience with SAML2, OpenID family, or OAuth 2.0 (* 1 year).

Knowledge of SQL databases, NoSQL databases, and caching solutions (* 1 year).

Experience with Kafka or similar asynchronous message queues (* 1 year).
* Experience developing open-source code.
* 

**What We Offer:**

  

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: React/Node JS utvecklare
description:
Om jobbet
  
Vi söker nu en Node React webbutvecklare som kan jobba med robust mobila och webb applikationer.
  
  

Om dig
  
Vi söker dig som har ett par års erfarenheter inom react utveckling och passar in på följande beskrivning.
  
* Vass på React, NextJS, Mern
* Erfarenhet av Node.js.
* Kan jobba självständigt.
